<zofar:questionSingleChoice uid="sc2" visible="v8_3_promovierende_erstbetreuer.value!='' and v8_3_promovierende_erstbetreuer.value!='0'" xmlns:zofar="http://www.his.de/zofar/xml/questionnaire" xmlns:display="http://www.dzhw.eu/zofar/xml/display" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
    <zofar:header>
        <zofar:question uid="q">Anteil in Prozent:</zofar:question>
    </zofar:header>
    <zofar:responseDomain itemClasses="true" type="dropdown" uid="rd" variable="v8_8_prof_betreuungsvereinbarung_Anteil">
        <zofar:answerOption label="bitte wählen Sie: " uid="ao0" value="0"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="10%" uid="ao1" value="1"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="20%" uid="ao2" value="2"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="30%" uid="ao3" value="3"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="40%" uid="ao4" value="4"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="50%" uid="ao5" value="5"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="60%" uid="ao6" value="6"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="70%" uid="ao7" value="7"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="80%" uid="ao8" value="8"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="90%" uid="ao9" value="9"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="100%" uid="ao10" value="10"/>
    </zofar:responseDomain>
</zofar:questionSingleChoice>
